name: Mika in-Sanity (fangame)
description:
Warning : horror element for brief moment

Where is Mika Melatika right now? but one thing for sure... escape the place!

This is platformer with 2 hard stages. you can only jump and you have to avoid hazards and enemies!
Learn their moves and you'll be able to get through it!

Common problem exist and i apologize as i can't figure out how to fix this Fusion 2.5 behaviour for now.

To do list:

  • how to not make the game crash randomly upon restarting level?

Mika Melatika is a Virtual Liver from Nijisanji ID ©ANYCOLOR, Inc.
This fan game has no affiliation to the owner of said intellectual property.
